---
title: "plot number of subjects each virus SGB and bacteria SGB appear in"
output: html_notebook
---

load packages
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(rprojroot)

```

set paths and filenames
```{r}
### files
long_table=sprintf("%s/data/mp142_TGVG1.1_MPA4_combined_abundance_table_longform1.tsv", find_rstudio_root_file())
metadata_table=sprintf("%s/data/some_teddy_MP142_metadata2.all_samples1.delivery.csv", find_rstudio_root_file())

```

load long table and metadata, merge 
```{r}
long_dt <- fread(sprintf("%s", long_table), sep = "\t", header = T) %>%
  select(sampleID, rel_abundance, lineage) %>%
  mutate(kingdom = case_when(grepl("k__Bac", lineage) ~ "Bacteria", 
                             grepl("k__Vir", lineage) ~ "Virus",
                             grepl("k__Ar", lineage) ~ "Archea",
                             grepl("k__Euk", lineage) ~ "Eukaryota",
                             TRUE ~ "other"))

meta_dt <- fread(sprintf("%s", metadata_table), sep = ",", header = T) %>%
  select(-V1)

merge_dt <- merge(long_dt, meta_dt, by.x = "sampleID", by.y ="sample")
```

group by mask_id (subject)
```{r}
group_dt <- merge_dt %>% 
  group_by(lineage) %>%
  mutate(n_subjects = n_distinct(mask_id)) %>%
  subset( select = c(lineage, kingdom, n_subjects)) %>%
  distinct()
```


plotting
```{r}
group_dt %>%
  filter(kingdom == "Virus" | kingdom == "Bacteria") %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_freqpoly(aes(n_subjects, color=kingdom), alpha=0.9, size=2, bins = 20) + 
  geom_rug(data = group_dt %>% filter(kingdom == "Virus"), aes(n_subjects, color=kingdom), alpha=0.2, outside = T) + 
  geom_rug(data = group_dt %>% filter(kingdom == "Bacteria"), aes(n_subjects, color=kingdom), alpha=0.2, outside = F) + 
  scale_colour_manual(name = '', values =c('Bacteria'='#F2AD00','Virus'='#5BBCD6'), labels = c('bacteria SGB','virus SGB')) +
  scale_y_continuous(trans="log", breaks = c(1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000), labels = c(1, 10, 100, 1000, "10,000")) + 
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off") +
  theme_bw() +
  xlim(0, 900) +
  theme(axis.ticks.length=unit(0.3, "cm")) + 
  ylab("Species Genome Bins (SGBs)") +
  xlab("number of subjects with SGB detected")

ggsave(sprintf("%s/charts/bacteria_vs_virus_SGB_patient_prevalence1.pdf", find_rstudio_root_file()), width = 4, height = 3)
```
